content: in this legal case a court has issued a final resolution regarding the division of a property located in torregrotta the parties involved are identified as po el and ci the court has ordered the sale of the property and the proceeds will be divided among the parties according to their respective shares the court also dismissed an application made by po the court considered the exclusive use of the property and determined that po must reimburse the other parties for their expenses additionally the court addressed the issue of costs and determined that they should be paid by the estate the decision was made on november 7 2020
